languages.text: "Вольные Торговцы — помазанники Императора. Я действую по Его повелению, о чем свидетельствует Его подпись на моем Патенте".

traits.locale_text: "Поосторожнее про Вольных Торговцев. Чтобы ты знал, святоша, мой Патент Император подписал лично".

languages.text: "Rogue Traders are the Emperor's anointed. I act at His command, as evidenced by His signature on my Warrant."
languages.original_text: "Вольные Торговцы — помазанники Императора. Я действую по Его повелению, о чем свидетельствует Его подпись на моем Патенте".

traits.locale_text: "Be careful when you speak of Rogue Traders. Do keep in mind, holy man, that my Warrant was signed by the Emperor Himself."
"Be careful when you speak of Rogue Traders. Do keep in mind, holy man, that my Warrant was signed by the Emperor Himself."
"Rogue Traders are the Emperor's anointed. I act at His command, as evidenced by His signature on my Warrant."
"Rogue Traders are the Emperor's anointed. I act at His command, as evidenced by His signature on my Warrant."
"Rogue Traders are the Emperor's anointed. I act at His command, as evidenced by His signature on my Warrant."

languages.text: “行商浪人是帝皇赐福之人。我遵照祂的命令行事，祂在这份授状上的签名就是证据。”
languages.original_text: "Rogue Traders are the Emperor's anointed. I act at His command, as evidenced by His signature on my Warrant."

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人是帝皇赐福之人。我遵照祂的命令行事，祂在这份许可证上的签名就是证据。”

languages.text: «Los Comerciantes Independientes son los ungidos del Emperador. Yo estoy a Sus órdenes, tal y como evidencia Su firma en mi Patente».
languages.original_text: "Rogue Traders are the Emperor's anointed. I act at His command, as evidenced by His signature on my Warrant."

traits.locale_text: «Los Comerciantes Independientes son los ungidos del Emperador. Yo estoy a Sus órdenes, tal y como evidencia Su firma en mi Patente».

languages.text: 「自由開拓者とは皇帝に聖別された者。{mf|俺|私}の令状にある皇帝の署名が示すとおり、{mf|俺|私}は皇帝の命令のまま動く」
languages.original_text: "Rogue Traders are the Emperor's anointed. I act at His command, as evidenced by His signature on my Warrant."

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者とは皇帝に聖別された者。{mf|俺|私}の令状にある皇帝の署名が示すとおり、{mf|俺|私}は皇帝の命令のまま動く」

languages.text: "Freihändler sind die Gesalbten des Imperators. Ich führe seine Befehle aus, wie seine Signatur auf meinem Handelsbrief beweist."
languages.original_text: "Rogue Traders are the Emperor's anointed. I act at His command, as evidenced by His signature on my Warrant."

traits.locale_text: "Freihändler sind die Gesalbten des Imperators. Ich führe seine Befehle aus, wie seine Signatur auf meinem Handelsbrief beweist."

languages.text: « Les libres-marchands sont nommés par l'Empereur en personne. J'agis selon Ses ordres, comme en atteste Sa signature sur ma lettre de marque. »
languages.original_text: "Rogue Traders are the Emperor's anointed. I act at His command, as evidenced by His signature on my Warrant."

traits.locale_text: « Les libres-marchands sont nommés par l'Empereur en personne. J'agis selon Ses ordres, comme en atteste Sa signature sur ma lettre de marque. »

languages.text: "Hür Tacirler, İmparator tarafından atanmışlardır. Ruhsatnamemde bulunan imza O'nundur, O'nun emriyle hareket ederim."
languages.original_text: "Rogue Traders are the Emperor's anointed. I act at His command, as evidenced by His signature on my Warrant."

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacirler, İmparator tarafından atanmışlardır. Ruhsatname'mde bulunan imza O'nundur ve O'nun emriyle hareket ederim."
